zones.name: Forest:
zones.welcome: You're in nature... hooray. For real though, beware of tics.

zones.name: Big Scary Death Mountain:
zones.welcome: If you saw the name on the sign, then why did you come here? You... did see the sign. Right?
zones.description: Wait, is that a dead dude... Okay... time to go.

zones.name: But Ass Cold Mountain-Top Tundra:
zones.welcome: Maybe bring a jacket and not that ragid lv. 1 adventures gear.

zones.name: The Fjords:
zones.welcome: Hey look I think I see a viking!
zones.description:
Never mind it's just some bearded norwegian in a canoe. but like for real though, there's a sword 
on the ground
